title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama (generate, chat, embed) built on Faraday.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and module for Ollama enabling declarative installs on NixOS.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset for using Ollama models in retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for RAG, function-calling, fine-tuning, and edge deployment.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose samples (CPU & GPU) for quick self-hosting.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal Python chatbot that combines Ollama + Chroma for private RAG on PDFs.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models to any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI assistance using Ollama models inside your notes.

title: ollama-mistral-finetune
summary: End-to-end notebook for fine-tuning Mistral 7B with LoRA and serving via Ollama.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Lightweight Telegram bot that proxies chats to your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer and LiveView examples.
